value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily
value.excerpt: In today's video I am collaborating with Imke Feldmann to bring you the best that M or Power Query has to offer.  We will show you how you can easily re-use M functions in your reports. value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.
